name: Drop Dimes to Support Creators
description: Drop Dimes is a creator-first platform that empowers artists, developers, musicians, and content creators to receive 100% of fan support instantly and without fees. Built on the Base blockchain and integrated with Coinbase Smart Wallet, Drop Dimes provides secure, self-custodied transactions using USDC. Fans can support their favorite creators with just a few taps, making it simple to show appreciation without recurring commitments. Available on iOS, Drop Dimes is redefining digital patronage by making support seamless, transparent, and creator-owned.
